meta.article_title: November 7, 2022 - Coming Back or Beating Stronger Players

coming_back_or_beating_stronger_players.probleme: Playing well against a strong opponent or when behind

debutant.step: Assume the opponent is going to be inconsistent if forced to go for difficult shots.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Playing with a balance between pressure and consistency
exercices_complementaires.description: Find the right balance where you put continuous pressure on the opponent while staying consistent.

metriques_progression: Make normal shots with more consistency than usual
